# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="d894a-102">空的收件匣</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d894a-103">**是空的我的收件匣**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-103">**My inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d894a-104">某些 Firefox 瀏覽器中的附加元件可能會防止載入的收件匣。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d894a-105">請造訪 Firefox 支援，以了解如何[停用或移除附加元件](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [Disable or remove Add-ons](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d894a-106">**我想要清空我收件匣**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d894a-107">如果您想要清空收件匣和刪除所有的電子郵件：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d894a-108">選取圓形</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d894a-109">下一步][收件匣](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox)頂端的郵件清單中選取您的所有郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d894a-110">在頁面頂端，選取 [**空白] 資料夾**(或**空焦點** / **清空其他**如果開啟焦點收件匣)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d894a-111">選取 [**全部刪除**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d894a-112">若要清除所有已刪除的郵件，開啟您[已刪除的項目] 資料夾](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems)，然後選取**空的資料夾** > **刪除所有**，然後選取 [在頁面頂端的 [**復原刪除此資料夾中的項目**，並選取 [**清空資料夾**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d894a-113">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[刪除 Outlook.com 電子郵件](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d894a-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
